timeline.bodyText: the docs here are outdated now
timeline.author: rebello95

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                case custom(String, EnvoyConfiguration)
          
          
            
                case standard(EnvoyConfiguration)
          
          
            
                case custom(yaml: String, config: EnvoyConfiguration)
          
          
            
                case standard(config: EnvoyConfiguration)
          
      
    
    
  

It might be nice to name these now since String is ambiguous, but not a big deal since this is private
timeline.author: rebello95
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,8 +9,8 @@ final class EngineImpl: NSObject {
   private let streamClientImpl: StreamClientImpl
 
   private enum ConfigurationType {
-    case yaml(String)
-    case typed(EnvoyConfiguration)
+    case custom(String, EnvoyConfiguration)
+    case standard(EnvoyConfiguration)
